AD_LaffRiotSign.synopsis: Sign at the front of the showroom

AD_Board_ElfsongEsterior_01.synopsis: Blackboard at the corner of the Elfsong exterior bar

AD_SpectatorTrophy.synopsis: On clicking the hanging spectator head

AD_FoodSign_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_FoodSign_0.text: *Hungry, friend? You will be when you see what Chef Roveer's cooked up for you!*

AD_LaffRiotSign_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_LaffRiotSign_0.text: *Are you funny enough to cause a Laff Riot? Come on in and challenge the house comedian!*

AD_DrinksSign_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_DrinksSign_0.text: *Belly up to the bar, we have mead, beer, and wine. Gold won't quench your thirst, get yourself a mug of joy!*

AD_Board_ElfsongEsterior_01_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_Board_ElfsongEsterior_01_0.text: *Bottoms up for our Baldur's Bones winners! Antes up for the next session. Same time every tenday.*

AD_SpectatorTrophy_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_SpectatorTrophy_0.text: *A stuffed Beholder. Grotesque as it is, it's part of the furniture. The Elfsong wouldn't be the same without it.*
